mapper.insert: insert into db_askrussianmobile (ORDERID, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, ERRORFLAG, SENDTIME, CONTENT, ERRORDESCR) values (#{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{errordescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_askrussianmobile set SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERRORFLAG = #{errorflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SENDTIME = #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ERRORDESCR = #{errordescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ORDERID, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, ERRORFLAG, SENDTIME, CONTENT, ERRORDESCR from db_askrussianmobile
